summary: A shipwrecked survivor discovers a remote island owned by a crazed scientist who is carrying out sinister experiments on the island's inhabitants.
cast: Burt Lancaster|Michael York|Nigel Davenport|Barbara Carrera|Richard Basehart|Nick Cravat|The Great John L.|Bob Ozman|Fumio Demura|Gary Baxley|John Gillespie|David S. Cass Sr.
title: La isla del Doctor Moreau
